channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: President Lai Attends Inauguration Dinner in Old Capital, Tainan
item.description: Newly installed President Lai Ching-te is in the southern city of Tainan for the customary inauguration dinner. It's the first time the event has been held in Taiwan's oldest city.

item.title: Beijing Calls Taiwan Independence ‘Dead End’ After Lai Inauguration
item.description: China’s foreign ministry has called Taiwan independence a "dead end" after President Lai Ching-te's inauguration on Monday. In his inauguration speech, Lai asked Beijing to stop it

item.title: AMD Plans New R&D Facility in Taiwan
item.description: American chip giant AMD is planning to set up a new research and development center in Taiwan. The tech company applied for the government's R&D program which aims to attract forei

item.title: Judoka Yang Yung-wei Becomes Olympic Top Seed With Silver in Abu Dhabi
item.description: Taiwan's Yang Yung-wei took silver in the men's 60 kg division at the 2024 World Judo Championships in Abu Dhabi. It was Taiwan's best performance at the competition and guarantees
